name: Alien Grenadier
description:
Alien Grenadier is an rogue-lite first person shooter - enter the biomes of planet in Alpha Cenaturi, and fend yourself from the creatures that inhabit it. With an array of grenades at your disposal, fight your way through procedurally generated and destructible environments.

Use your explosives to create magnetic pulls, zero-gravity zones, trampoline, ice grenades and even time manipulation to take down the aliens and droids protecting the human bases. Interact with the physics of the world and chain effects of your other grenades to create combos with your explosives for maximum effect!
